titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a presumption of service connection for purposes of veterans benefits for a certain disability suffered by former prisoners of war.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide a presumption of service connection (for purposes of eligibility for veterans' benefits) for spastic colon condition suffered by former prisoners of war.
